title: Children participating in cricket in England 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall 5-10 years is gradually decreasing, 11-15 years is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Share of respondents, in descending order is: 1. 11-15 years, and lastly, 2. 5-10 years.
The greatest difference of Share of respondents between 5-10 years and 11-15 years occurs at Year 2012/13 and the smallest difference occurs at 2010/11.
